amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt voter guides from the "express advocacy" provisions contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 3 printed in H.Rept. 106-311 to specify that the term "express advocacy" shall not apply to voter guides.

action.text: Doolittle amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment is modified to strike line 9 and all that follows through page 17, line 22 and to insert new text.
On agreeing to the Doolittle amendment (A003) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 238 (Roll no. 413).
